data.title: Harold Lloyd Mertz
data.text:
Spouses

Marriage15 February 1953, Milton. PA

Research notes for Harold Lloyd Mertz

Obit, 4/29/14 Sunbury Daily Item: “Harold Lloyd “Red” Mertz, 83, entered into rest at 9:12 a.m. Friday, April 18, 2014, at his home.â¨â¨He was born May 28, 1930, in Milton, a son of the late George and Marion (Berger) Mertz. On Feb. 15, 1953, in Milton, he married the former Mary K. Beck who survives.â¨â¨Surviving in addition to his wife of 61 years, are two sons and one daughter-in-law, Dann A. and Donna Mertz, of Millmont, and Keith A. Mertz, of Florida; one daughter and son-in-law, Vickie A. and Michael Coup, of Milton; five grandchildren, Kari, Matthew, Pattie, Dann II, and Amy; and 13 great-grandchildren.â¨â¨He was preceded in death by four brothers, Donald, Charles, Robert, and Herbert Mertz; and one sister, Emma Mertz.

Children Names notes for Mary K (Spouse 1)

From Edythe (Walter) Mertz, Harold and Mary had three children: Vickie, Dann and Keith.
